技能.描述: Charges forward, dealing Umbro AoE DMG 4 times along the path.

Switches the melee weapon to [Ymir] and casts 1 Swordwave.
When performing Normal Attack using [Ymir], unleashes Swordwaves in the attacking direction and constantly consumes Sanity, during which Benerica is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. Once Sanity drops to 0 or the skill is used again, [Ymir] is sheathed.
When dealing damage with [Faintlight] or Sword, there is a chance to restore Sanity for Berenica.
After using [Netherflames], the next use of [Faintlight] will not consume Sanity.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases ATK for self and Umbro allies.

溯源: Upon using Helix Leap or [Faintlight], Berenica gains 1 stack that increases Skill Efficiency by 8% for 12s, up to 3 stacks.
Increases damage dealt to targets with a HP percentage lower than Berenica by 30%.
[Faintlight] Level +2; [Recuperation] Level +1.
Increases Berenica's Attack by 20% per Combo Level.
[Netherflames] Level +2; [Recuperation] Level +1.
When in [Netherflames] state, each attack has a chance to unleash 1 additional Swordwave. The probability equals to 25% of [Ymir]'s Trigger Probability.

技能.描述:
Deals Umbro Damage to enemies in front and inflicts 5 stacks of [Adagio] on them, up to 10 stacks. The remaining time of the effect is refreshed with each new stack gained.
When in [Bestial Fury] state, this skill is replaced with [Aria].

术语解释.Aria:
Dashes forward, dealing Umbro Damage to enemies along the path, and gains [Presto].
[Presto]: Increases Skill Range and grants immunity to Hitstun.

技能.描述:
Enters [Bestial Fury] state and continuously consumes Sanity; when Sanity drops to 0, [Bestial Fury] state ends.
Weapons can not be used during [Bestial Fury] state. 
Melee Attack is replaced with [Furious Claws], performing up to four consecutive attacks to deal Umbro Damage. When used in the air, Phantasio performs Plunging Attack and deals Umbro damage to enemies within range.
Ranged Attack is replaced with [Mournful Howl], firing an energy beam to deal Umbro Damage.
When the 3-hit of [Furious Claws] and [Mournful Howl] deal damage, triggers [Duo]; when the 4-hit of [Furious Claws] and the Plunging Attack deal damage, triggers [Fermata].

术语解释.Duo: Grants a certain amount of [Immersion]. This effect can only be triggered once every 0.1 seconds.
术语解释.Fermata: Increases Phantasio's damage based on the target's [Adagio] stacks, then removes all [Adagio] stacks. When there are 10 [Adagio] stacks on the target, restores Phantasio's Sanity and grants a certain amount of [Immersion]. This effect can only be triggered once every attack.

技能.描述:
When in [Bestial Fury] state, increases Attack based on Phantasio's Max Sanity.
Phantasio gains [Immersion] by using skills, with the [Immersion] cap equal to Phantasio's Max Sanity. Using [Recitativo] or [Aria] gains a certain amount of [Immersion]; when in [Bestial Fury] state, continuously gains [Immersion] per second.
When [Immersion] reaches its maximum in [Bestial Fury] state, Phantasio enters [Bestial Fury: Devotion] state.

术语解释.Bestial Fury: Devotion:
While under [Bestial Fury: Devotion], continuously drains [Immersion] instead of Sanity to maintain the state. Increases Skill Speed, and boosts ATK based on the user's Max Sanity. 
While active, [Bestial Fury: Devotion] prevents [Immersion] gain from sustaining Beast Form.

技能.描述: When the 3-hit of [Furious Claws] and [Mournful Howl] deal damage, there is a chance to inflict 1 [Adagio] stack on the target.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases ATK for self and Umbro allies.

溯源: [Immersion] gained from [Duo] is increased to 1.5% of Max Sanity.
When using the 3-hit of [Furious Claws] and [Mournful Howl], decreases Damage Taken by 25% and increases the chance of inflicting [Adagio] through [Concerto] to 100%.
[Recitativo] Level +2, [On Stage] Level +1.
When dealing damage with the 4th hit of [Savage Claws] or a Plunging Attack, increases damage by 110% if the target has 10 stacks of [Adagio].
[Curtain Up] Level +2, [On Stage] Level +1.
[Presto] grants an additional 90% Morale Increase. When [Duo]'s [Immersion] is triggered, extends [Presto]'s duration by 0.2s.

技能.描述: Lunges forward, dealing Lumino AoE DMG 3 times along the path, then slams down to deal more Lumino AoE damage.

Switches the user's melee weapon to [Samael], dealing Lumino DMG to enemies ahead. While wielding [Samael], use the skill is used again to withdraw [Samael].
Normal Attacks with [Samael] chain up to 4 hits.
While wielding [Samael], hold attack to charge — Sanity is consumed over time. While charging, gains [Impatience], generating combo points every 0.5s.
Releasing attack, reaching max Combo Level, or running out of Sanity unleashes a powerful Charged Attack, dealing Lumino AoE DMG to enemies ahead.

术语解释.Impatience: Grants immunity to Hitstun and reduces Damage Taken.

技能.描述:
When Combo Level increases, deals Lumino DMG to nearby enemies and enhances [Samael].
At Combo Levels C/B/A/S, [Samael] gains Enhancement Lv.1/2/3/4 respectively. If Combo Level drops, the current Enhancement Level persists for a short time.
While [Samael] is enhanced, the user's Consonance Weapon gains increased ATK Range and Trigger Probability based on the Enhancement Level.
Unleashing [Samael]'s Charged Attack at Combo Level S extends [Impatience] duration.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Lumino allies.

溯源: Using [In the Name of Patience] increases Character ATK by 35% for 15s.
When damage triggers a bonus effect, gain 1 additional combo point.
[In the Name of Patience] Level +2, [Hmph!!] Level +1
When Combo Level increases, gains 5 additional combo points.
[That's It!] Level +2, [Hmph!!] Level +1
After using [That's It!] or [Samael]'s Charged Attack, gains 30% additional Lumino Damage for 15 seconds.

技能.描述:
Creates 1 [Lunar Hunt] and replaces this skill with [Solar Eclipse]. 
 [Lunar Hunt]: Deals Umbro Damage to all enemies within range upon spawn and reduces their Movement Speed.

术语解释.Solar Eclipse:
Creates 1 [Solar Eclipse] and replaces this skill with [Lunar Hunt]. 
[Solar Eclipse]: Deals Lumino Damage to all enemies in range upon creation and reduces their ATK.

技能.描述:
Enters [Funeral Rite] status. Upon entry, if the user's Skill Range exceeds 100%, the excess is converted into Skill Damage at a fixed ratio, and Skill Range is reduced to 100% for the duration.
While under [Funeral Rite], gains Trigger Probability Increase for ranged weapons; [Lunar Hunt] and [Solar Eclipse] cost no Sanity; [Lunar Hunt] pulls enemies toward its centre; [Solar Eclipse] deals increased damage.
[Funeral Rite] ends after a set duration or after casting a total of 6 [Lunar Hunt] and/or [Solar Eclipse].

Based on the user's Trigger Probability for ranged weapons, casting [Lunar Hunt] has a chance to also spawn [Solar Eclipse] at the same location, which in turn may spawn another [Lunar Hunt]. [Solar Eclipse] and [Lunar Hunt] instances generated this way are not enhanced by [Misty Sea Requiem].
[Lunar Hunt] can trigger Umbro bonus effects. [Solar Eclipse] can trigger Lumino bonus effects.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Lumino allies.

溯源: Increases [Interwoven Cries] Effect Trigger Probability by 15% and its max Trigger Probability to 65%.
When [Lunar Hunt] deals damage, [Solar Eclipse] gains +75% damage against the target for 3s. When [Solar Eclipse] deals damage, [Lunar Hunt] gains +75% damage against the target for 3s.
[Lunar Hunt] Level +2, [Interwoven Cries] Level +1.
Increases Lady Nifle's Healing Received by 50% and Sanity Recovery by 25%.
[Misty Sea Requiem] Level +2; [Interwoven Cries] Level +1.
When dealing damage using a ranged weapon, there's a 25% chance to summon either [Lunar Hunt] or [Solar Eclipse] at the target's location. This effect can only be triggered once every second.

技能.描述:
Deals Lumino Damage to enemies within range 3 times and increases Kezhou's Ranged Weapon Attack Speed.

While in [Aspect Manifestation] state, increases Kezhou's Melee Weapon Attack Speed, during which Kezhou is immune to Hitstun when taking damage.

Enters [Aspect Manifestation] state and summons [Edges of All Times] to rain from the sky, dealing Lumino Damage to enemies within range.

While in [Aspect Manifestation] state, Kezhou's Melee Weapon becomes [Phanosword]. When triggering Bonus Effect using [Phanosword], generates 1 [Phanoplume].
While in [Aspect Manifestation] state, this skill is replaced with [Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams].

术语解释.Phanosword:
Inherits all stats from Kezhou's melee weapon and gains increased Attack Range.
[Phanosword] has Normal Attack modes for Sword, Greatsword, Polearm, and Dual Blades. After executing the final hit of [Phanosword], it switches to a random attack mode and launches all [Phanoplumes].
术语解释.Phanoplume:
Kezhou can have a maximum of 7 [Phanoplumes] at the same time. When launched, each [Phanoplume] selects a random enemy to orbit and homes towards them to attack, dealing Lumino Damage to enemies along the path. After attacking the enemy 3 times, the [Phanoplume] dissipates.

Targets hit by [Phanoplume] take additional damage, which is equivalent to a certain percentage of the DoT of Bonus Effect: Lumino multiplied by Kezhou's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.
术语解释.Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams: Ends [Aspect Manifestation] state and deals Lumino Damage to enemies in front.

技能.描述:
Begins with 50 points each of [Sword Intent] and [String Intent] (maximum 100).
 [Sword Intent] increases Melee Weapon Damage Dealt and Melee Weapon Trigger Probability, and reduces the Sanity Cost of [Lightswords Slice Starry Streams]. At maximum [Sword Intent], Sanity Cost is further reduced by 30.
 [String Intent] increases Ranged Weapon Damage Dealt and Ranged Weapon Trigger Probability, and reduces the Sanity Cost of [Feathers Chase Dust In Dreams]. At maximum [String Intent], Sanity Cost is further reduced by 30.
While in [Aspect Manifestation] state, each time damage is dealt with a melee weapon, 1 point of [Sword Intent] converts into [String Intent]. While out of [Aspect Manifestation] state, each time damage is dealt with a ranged weapon, 1 point of [String Intent] converts into [Sword Intent].

技能.名称: Yet the Drifter Marks the Change
技能.描述:
Upon entering [Aspect Manifestation] state, records the current [Sword Intent] points. For a period of time, if the [Sword Intent] point drops below this value, the [Sword Intent] effect applied to [Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] will adopt the recorded value instead. This effect is invalid after exiting [Aspect Manifestation] state.

Upon ending [Aspect Manifestation] state, records the current [String Intent] points. For a period of time, if the [String Intent] point drops below this value, the [String Intent] effect applied to [Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] will adopt the recorded value instead. This effect is invalid while in [Aspect Manifestation] state.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Lumino allies.

溯源:
Increases the effect percentage of [Sword Intent]/[String Intent] applied to [Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] by 132.37%.

When there is/are 1/2 enemy/enemies within 20 metres, the mutual conversion point between [Sword Intent] and [String Intent] is increased to 3/2 points when Kezhou deals weapon damage.
When damage triggers a bonus effect, gains +90% Damage Dealt for 5s and restores 2 Sanity. Sanity restoration can occur once every 1s.
[Wanderings of Youth] Level +2; [Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] Level +1.
When using [Lightswords Slice Starry Streams], Kezhou gains [Blessed by Wind and Moon]: Grants immunity to Hitstun and reduces Damage Taken by 25% for 25s.

[Lightswords Slice Starry Streams] Level +2;
[Life's A Fleeting, Shifting Tide] Level +1.
When triggering Bonus Effect, Kezhou gains 1 stack that increases his PEN stats by 3% for 12s, up to 18 stacks.

技能.描述: Enters [Cruise], gaining high-speed flight and dealing Lumino DMG to enemies along the path. This state continuously drains [Artificer Energy] and ends when Energy reaches 0 or when the skill is recast.

Consumes all Sanity to summon the [Artificer Arsenal]. For a certain amount of Sanity consumed, grants 1 stack of [Artificer Supply], up to 10 stacks. Su Yi's melee weapon becomes the [Artificer Greatsword], and the ranged weapon becomes the [Artificer Cannon].
 While the Arsenal is active, Su Yi becomes immune to Hitstun. Recasting the skill retracts the Arsenal.

Each bullet fired by the [Artificer Arsenal] grants 1 stack of [Overheat], stacking up to 400 times. Retracting the Arsenal consumes all Overheat stacks. If 200 or more stacks are consumed, the Arsenal launches forward and explodes on impact, dealing AoE Lumino DMG.
Generates an [Artificer Shield] when the [Artificer Arsenal] is summoned.

溯源: When the [Artificer Greatsword] or [Artificer Cannon] deals damage, triggers an additional instance of AoE Lumino DMG at the target's location. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.
[Artificer Supply] additionally increases Skill DMG.
[Cruise] Level ＋2, [Artificer Kinetics] Level ＋1.
Each bullet fired by the [Artificer Arsenal] restores HP to the [Artificer Shield]. While the Shield is active, damage taken is reduced.
[Artificer Armament] Level ＋2, [Artificer Kinetics] Level ＋1.
For 10s after casting the Ultimate, each bullet fired by the [Artificer Arsenal] restores 1 bullet, and the Overheat cap increases to 600.

技能.描述: Unleashes 2 Swordwaves, dealing Lumino DMG to enemies on hit and guaranteed to trigger Lumino bonus effects.
Deals Lumino DMG to nearby enemies and grants self and allies both Ultra Shields and [Incandescence].
When a Lumino bonus effect is triggered, deals an additional Lumino AoE Damage at the target's location. This effect triggers 1 time every 0.5s.
Using [Flare] grants Trigger Probability Increase for self and allies.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases Weapon DMG for self and allies.

溯源: While under [Incandescence], [Dawn Beyond Night]'s Swordwaves deal 70% more damage.
Casting [Flare] creates a [Prism] field with a 10-metre radius that lasts for 10s. Continuously reduces the Movement Speed of enemies inside by 50%.
[Dawn Beyond Night] Level +2, [Diffusion] Level +1.
Using a skill grants +9% ATK Speed for 12s, stacking up to 4 times.
[Flare] Level +2, [Diffusion] Level +1.
[Incandescence] additionally grants +54% CRIT Chance.

技能.描述:
Deals Lumino Damage to enemies in front and reduces their Movement Speed.
While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, using this skill relocates the field to the user's position, expands its range to match [Boisterous Tea Party], and increases its damage.

Creates a [Boisterous Tea Party] field in front of Fina. [Boisterous Tea Party] continuously consumes Sanity and ends when Sanity drops to 0 or when this skill is held.

During [Boisterous Tea Party], using the skill again will switch the field effects in the order of the [Tea Party Guests] — [Nightingale], [Hound], [Unicorn], and [Butterfly].
Using the skill again outside the range of [Boisterous Tea Party] will relocate it to Fina's current location.

术语解释.Boisterous Tea Party:
Generates an elemental field based on the type of the [Tea Party Guests] — [Nightingale] for Hydro, [Hound] for Pyro, [Unicorn] for Electro, and [Butterfly] for Anemo.
When the field appears or its element shifts, Fina and allies  deal an instance of additional damage matching the field's type. While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, the field also deals elemental damage to enemies within range every 2s.

技能.描述: Grants additional Lumino Damage that lasts throughout the battle. Each time ["On a Warm Afternoon"] is used, grants 6 stacks of [Taleweaver Quill]. While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, generates 1 stack of [Taleweaver Quill] per second (up to 30 stacks).
Using ["On a Warm Afternoon"] increases the user's and allies' damage based on the number of [Taleweaver Quill] stacks.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases Weapon DMG for self and allies proficient in Swords or Assault Rifles.

溯源: Targets granted the ability to deal additional elemental damage by [Boisterous Tea Party] gain an effect that increases their PEN stats by 6% for each type of additional damage effect they possess.
Increases max [Taleweaver Quill] stacks to 45. Using ["On a Warm Afternoon"] grants 3 additional stacks. While [Boisterous Tea Party] is active, gains 1 extra stack per second.
["On a Warm Afternoon"] Level +2; ["Bad Sorcerers Hate Sunlight!"] Level +1.
Each stack of [Taleweaver Quill] increases Fina's Skill Damage by 2% and Skill Range by 1%.
["Let the Tea Party Begin!"] Level +2; ["Bad Sorcerers Hate Sunlight!"] Level +1.

During [Boisterous Tea Party], when Fina deals weapon damage, for each Bonus Effect the target is suffering, the CRIT Chance of this attack is increased by 24%, and the elemental type of the damage is converted to the target's weakness type.

技能.描述: Summons 1 [Aurelia Aurita]. A maximum of 3 can exist at the same time.

术语解释.Summon: Aurelia Aurita: Inherits 100% of Rebecca's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies.

技能.描述: Deals Hydro Damage to nearby enemies; the damage is increased based on the number of [Poison of Love] stacks inflicted on the enemies.
When dealing damage with a melee weapon or [Aurelia Aurita]'s attack, inflicts 1 stack of [Poison of Love] on the target, up to 6 stacks.

术语解释.Poison of Love:
Deals Hydro Damage once every 2s.
When defeated, enemies inflicted with [Poison of Love] transfer their [Poison of Love] to nearby enemies based on the current stack count and remaining duration.

技能.描述:
When dealing damage with a Normal Attack using a melee weapon, there's a chance to have [Poison of Love] inflicted on the target to deal additional damage once.
Dealing damage with [Lada Lovedew] will always trigger this effect.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases ATK for self and Hydro allies.

溯源: When triggering Bonus Effect, inflicts 1 additional stack of [Poison of Love] on the target.
Increases the maximum number of [Aurelia Aurita] allowed on the field to 5 and the stack cap of [Poison of Love] to 8.
[Aurelian Caress] Level +2; [Truelove Trial] Level +1.
Takes 30% less damage from targets inflicted with [Poison of Love].
[Lada Lovedew] Level +2; [Truelove Trial] Level +1.

When defeating a target inflicted with [Poison of Love], Rebecca gains 1 stack that increases Attack by 3% for 15s, up to 50 stacks. The remaining time of the effect is refreshed with each new stack gained.

技能.描述:
[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases ATK for self and Hydro allies.
Commands all [Summon: Tentacles] to attack once, increasing their Damage Dealt. Also grants self and allies a boost to Skill DMG.
Summons 9 [Tentacles] around Tabethe.

术语解释.Summon: Tentacles: Inherits 100% of Tabethe's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies and capturing up to 2 enemies to immobilise them.

技能.描述:
Dealing CRIT Damage using a ranged weapon has a chance to summon 1 [Tentacle] near the target, which can only be triggered once per second.
A maximum of 18 [Tentacles] can exist at the same time.

术语解释.Summon: Tentacles: Inherits 100% of Tabethe's stats, continuously dealing Hydro Damage to nearby enemies and capturing up to 2 enemies to immobilise them.

技能.描述: When summoning [Tentacles], Tabethe gains 1 stack that increases her CRIT Chance, up to 10 stacks.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases Skill DMG for self and allies.

溯源: Increases the number of [Tentacles] summoned through [Brawl For Justice!] to 12 and the maximum number of [Tentacles] that can exist at the same time to 24.
When [Tentacle] deals damage, there is a 10% chance to reload 1 projectile for Tabethe. This effect can only be triggered once every second.
[Tabethe's Specialty!] Level +2; [Have Tricks, Will Travel!] Level +1.
For each [Tentacle] on the field, increases Tabethe's CRIT Chance by 2%.
[Brawl For Justice!] Level +2; [Have Tricks, Will Travel!] Level +1.
Enemies captured by [Tentacle] take Hydro Damage equivalent to 280% of [Tentacle]'s ATK once every 2s.

技能.描述: Summons 1 [Yunchi]. A maximum of 2 [Yunchi] can exist at the same time.

术语解释.Summon: Yunchi:
Inherits 100% of Fushu's stats and deals Hydro Damage to the nearest 5 enemies once every second.
[Yunchi] restores HP and Sanity for nearby teammates once every 3s.

技能.描述: Deals Hydro Damage to nearby enemies. Grants the user an Ultra Shield and an ATK Speed Increase. Nearby allies receive an Ultra Shield and [Nine-Needle Therapy].

术语解释.Nine-Needle Therapy: Increases Skill Damage by a percentage of [Fushu]'s Skill Damage.

技能.描述: Using a Combat or Ultimate Skill (by the user or nearby allies) grants 1 stack of Skill Speed Increase, up to 2 stacks. Remaining Time refreshes each time a new stack is gained.
Increases Skill Damage based on the number of [Yunchi] on the field.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases Skill DMG for self and allies if 2 or more characters on the team share the same element.

溯源: When Fushu or her nearby teammates are applied with [Nine-Needle Therapy], they ignore the target's DEF by 30% when dealing Skill Damage.
Increases the maximum number of [Yunchi] allowed on the field at the same time to 3.
[Subcelestial Solace] Level +2; [Archaeus Revival] Level +1.
Increase the stack cap of [Archaeus Revival] to 3, and grants 12% Morale Boost per stack.
[Holistic Harmony] Level +2; [Archaeus Revival] Level +1.
During the ATK Speed boost effect granted by [Holistic Harmony], Fushu's melee normal attack deals 220% additional Hydro Damage.

技能.描述: Deals Pyro Damage to enemies in front and inflicts [Laceration].

术语解释.Laceration:
When under the influence of [Laceration], every time the enemy takes ranged weapon damage from [Lynn], the [Lacerated Wound] count is increased by 1.
When the [Laceration] duration ends, deals Pyro Damage equivalent to [Lacerated Wound] count × [Laceration] DMG to the enemy once.

技能.描述:
Switches the ranged weapon to [Hansel and Gretel]. In this state, Lynn can shoot and use skills, but can only move using [Deadly Blossom].
Shooting deals damage to all enemies in front, during which Lynn gains 1 stack that increases Lynn's ATK Speed every 0.2s, up to 35 stacks.
Using [Hansel and Gretel] continuously consumes Sanity, during which Lynn is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. When Sanity drops to 0 or the skill is used again, sheathes [Hansel and Gretel].

When not shooting, Lynn gains 1 stack of [Preload] per second, up to 6 stacks.
When shooting, consumes all stacks of [Preload] to gain [Suppressing Fire] for a period of time.
[Suppressing Fire]: Increases the damage based on the number of the consumed [Preload] stacks. 
Cannot gain [Preload] stack during [Suppressing Fire].
Immediately removes [Laceration] and deals damage once the [Lacerated Wound] count reaches its maximum.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Pyro allies.

溯源: Grants 6 stacks of [Preload] when battle starts, and increases Morale by 35% for 60s.
During [Gunpowder Revelry], reduces Damage Taken by 30%, and decreases the interval of gaining the ATK Speed boost to 0.06s.
[Deadly Blossom] Level +2; [Tactical Rapid Fire] Level +1.
Increases damage dealt to targets with a HP percentage lower than 50% by 70%.
[Gunpowder Revelry] Level +2; [Tactical Rapid Fire] Level +1.
During [Gunpowder Revelry], when triggering Bonus Effect using [Hansel and Gretel], inflicts [Laceration] on the target(s) for 8s.

技能.描述:
Commands all [Dirtexpellers] to continuously revolve around Hilda and fire [Hyperthermal Purgejets], during which the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers] pauses.
[Hyperthermal Purgejets] deal Pyro Damage to enemies, and defeating an enemy has a chance to restore Sanity for Hilda during the [Hyperthermal Purgejets] firing.

Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies and inflicts [Disarm] on them. For each target hit, summons 1 [Light Dirtexpeller] around Hilda and resets the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers].
Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] around. [Heavy Dirtexpellers] and [Light Dirtexpellers] automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage.
A maximum of 6 [Light Dirtexpellers] can exist at the same time.
When dodging, Hilda reloads her ranged weapon Magazine to maximum and gains [Elegant Anger].

术语解释.Elegant Anger: Increases the ATK Speed of [Dirtexpeller], the Rotation Speed of [Pyrolytic Cleaning] and the ATK Speed of ranged weapons.

技能.描述:
[Dirtexpeller] has a chance to fire 1 additional projectile, the probability equals to [30%+20%×Hilda's Ranged Weapon Multishot].
Increases the damage of [Hyperthermal Purgejet] by [30%+20%×Hilda's Ranged Weapon Multishot].

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Pyro allies.

溯源: Increases Hilda's Dodge Attempts by 2 and the effect [Elegant Anger] grants by 30%.

Increases the length of [Hyperthermal Purgejet] by 50%.
When [Hyperthermal Purgejet] deals damage, inflicts an effect to the target that increases damage taken from Hilda by 85% for 2s.
[Pyrolytic Cleaning] Level +2; [Automatic Sanitizing] Level +1.
When using [Wholehearted Service], summons 2 additional [Light Dirtexpellers], and decreases the target's damage by 25% for 12s.
[Wholehearted Service] Level +2; [Automatic Sanitizing] Level +1.
Increases Hilda's PEN stats by 55% during [Pyrolytic Cleaning].

技能.描述: Drops a bomb named [Tot Popper], assuming the form of either [Tot Popper: Yale's Make] or [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make]. Upon landing, the bomb explodes after 2s, dealing Pyro Damage to enemies within a cross-shaped area and detonating any other [Tot Poppers] within range. A maximum of 10 [Tot Poppers] can exist at the same time.

术语解释.Tot Popper: Yale's Make: When dealing damage, causes greater Stance reduction to the target(s). The greater the difference between Yale and Oliver's Skill Range and the Skill Damage, the higher the chance of deploying [Tot Popper: Yale's Make]. If the difference is no less than 50%, it's guaranteed to be a [Tot Popper: Yale's Make].
术语解释.Tot Popper: Oliver's Make: Deals higher damage. The greater the difference between Yale and Oliver's Skill Damage and the Skill Range provided by equipped Demon Wedges, the higher the chance of deploying [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make]. If the difference is no less than 50%, it's guaranteed to be a [Tot Popper: Oliver's Make].

技能.描述: Generates [Nightmare Lab] around Yale and Oliver. Using the skill again can close [Nightmare Lab] in advance.

术语解释.Nightmare Lab:
When in the area of [Nightmare Lab]:
The Movement Speed of enemies within range is decreased.
The detonation timers of [Tot Poppers] on the ground are paused, and they won't be detonated by other [Tot Poppers].

When [Nightmare Lab] closes:
Detonates all [Tot Poppers] within range and the lab explodes to deal Pyro Damage to the enemies within range. For each [Tot Popper] detonated, increases the explosion damage of [Nightmare Lab] and restores Sanity for Yale and Oliver.

技能.描述: When a [Tot Popper] is deployed, if it's no less than 2 metres above the ground, it deals Pyro Damage to nearby enemies upon landing.

Each time a [Tot Popper] is deployed, Yale and Oliver gains 1 stack of [Bombing Frenzy], up to 3 stacks.
[Bombing Frenzy]: Increases Skill Efficiency.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Pyro allies.

溯源: If a [Tot Popper] is detonated by a different type of [Tot Popper], restores 1 point of Sanity for Yale and Oliver; if detonated by the same type, restores 2.
The Movement Speed decrease effect inflicted on enemies in [Nightmare Lab] is increased to 60%.
[Tot Popper] Level +2; [The Rules of Bomb] Level +1.
When deploying a [Tot Popper] in [Nightmare Lab], there's a 45% chance to deploy 1 additional [Tot Popper].
[Nightmare's Grasp] Level +2; [The Rules of Bomb] Level +1.
When Yale and Oliver is applied with [Bombing Frenzy], each deployed [Tot Popper] combines the features of both types, dealing higher damage and posing greater Stance reduction.

技能.描述: Enters [Retribution] state.

术语解释.Retribution:
Deals Pyro Damage to nearby enemies once every 2s.
If Hellfire takes damage during [Retribution], extends the state duration and deals [Puncture Retribution] Pyro Damage to nearby enemies once every 2s.

技能.描述: Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies and taunts them.
Increases Max HP and continuously restores HP.
Increases damage dealt to enemies taunted by Hellfire.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Pyro allies.

溯源: Increases damage dealt to enemies within a 6-metre radius around Hellfire by 30%.
Increases the HP recovery granted by [Retributive Resolve] to 0.4%.
[Raging Inferno] Level +2; [Retributive Resolve] Level +1.
Decreases the interval of dealing [Puncture Retribution] Pyro Damage to 1.4s.
[Cage of Despair] Level +2; [Retributive Resolve] Level +1.
For every 5 Sanity-consuming skill uses by nearby allies, Hellfire automatically unleashes [Cage of Despair]. Can trigger once every 5s.

技能.描述: Launches all [Spinblades], dealing Pyro DMG to enemies in front and granting 1 stack of [Inebriation] to the user. Tap repeatedly or hold the Attack button to unleash a flurry of attacks.

术语解释.Inebriation: Gains Skill Speed. [Spinblades] travel faster and their duration is paused. Gains immunity to Hitstun. All [Inebriation] stacks are removed when [Burgundy Flurry] ends.

技能.描述: Deals Pyro DMG to enemies in front and summons 8 [Spinblades] to orbit the user, dealing damage to enemies along their path.

术语解释.Spinblade: Each [Spinblade] completes one orbit around the character every 2s. When launched, it travels up to 30m before returning. If struck by [Burgundy Flurry] while returning, it is relaunched toward a random enemy within 20m. Each launch refreshes its speed based on [Inebriation] stacks. A maximum of 8 [Spinblades] can exist at once.

技能.描述: Damage from [Spinblades] inflicts 1 stack of [Laceration], stacking up to 20 times.

术语解释.Laceration: All weapon and skill damage (excluding [Spinblades] and [Laceration]) detonates 2 stacks of [Laceration], dealing additional elemental damage. Max 20 detonations per second.

技能.描述: Triggering [Laceration] grants 1 [Tipsy Mark]. Restores Sanity once every 20 Marks gained.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Pyro allies.

溯源: Damage from [Spinblades] has a 30% chance to inflict 1 additional stack of [Laceration].
Attacks from [Burgundy Flurry] can block incoming projectiles. Each stack of [Inebriation] reduces Damage Taken by 3%.
[Burgundy Flurry] Level +2, [Claret Waltz] Level +1.
Damage from [Laceration] detonation is increased by 30%.
[Claret Waltz] Level +2, [Burgundy Flurry] Level +1.
All weapon and skill damage (excluding [Spinblades] and [Laceration]) detonates 2 stacks of [Laceration].

技能.描述: Attack enemies within range in front, dealing Pyro Damage and stunning them. When using this skill by holding, Margie makes a continuous attack.

Casts 3 [Margie's Combustible Bins] forward. They immediately explode upon hitting any target or obstacle, dealing AoE Pyro Damage and consuming a certain stacks of [Jackpot!] for enhancement:
When consuming 3 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Increases the explosion range and damage.
When consuming 6 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Creates a Zealous Zone after the explosion, dealing Pyro Damage once every 2s to enemies within the zone.
When consuming 9 stacks of [Jackpot!]: Deals additional AoE Pyro Damage 2 times after the explosion.
When the user or allies pick up loot, the user gains 1 stack of [Jackpot!], lasting for the rest of the battle. Each stack increases Skill DMG, up to 20 stacks.
Grants ATK Increase to other allies.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases ATK for self and allies.

溯源: When [Margie's Combustible Bin] consumes [Jackpot!] stacks, there's a 30% chance to regain the consumed stacks.
When using [Margie's Treasure Shovel], there's a 12% chance to deal additional damage to 1 random enemy within range once.
[Margie's Treasure Shovel] Level +2; [Margie's Recycling Sack] Level +1.
Extends the duration of the Zealous Zone created by [Margie's Combustible Bin] to 20s.
[Margie's Combustible Bin] Level +2; [Margie's Recycling Sack] Level +1.
When [Margie's Combustible Bin] deals damage, damage dealt to the target from Margie is increased by 60% for 5s.

技能.描述:
Rhythm leaps forward, dealing Electro Damage to enemies along the path.
When the [Electric Energy] point is no less than 30, consumes 30 points to increase the leap speed and [Volt Rush]'s damage, and grants an effect that increases the damage dealt by Rhythm.

Deals Electro Damage to enemies within range and enters [Electro Surge] state, during which it continuously consumes Sanity.
[Electro Surge] state ends when Sanity drops to 0 or when the skill is used again.

术语解释.Electro Surge: Increases Movement Speed for self and allies. Every second, deals Electro Damage to 1 random enemy in range, alternating between [Positive Charge] and [Negative Charge]. Prioritises enemies with no [Electric Charge].
术语解释.Electric Charge:
Target with [Positive Charge] selects 1 random target with [Negative Charge] within range every 3s, both being pulled towards the midpoint between their positions and taking Electro Damage. If no [Negative Charge] targets are around, selects 1 random target to take Electro Damage together. 
When a target with [Electric Charge] is inflicted with the same charge type again, the duration of the [Electric Charge] on them is refreshed, and they cannot be applied with the opposite [Electric Charge] type.

技能.描述: When consuming Sanity, converts a percentage of consumed Sanity into [Electric Energy]. The upper limit of [Electric Energy] is equal to the max Sanity.
When consuming [Electric Energy], converts 50% of the consumed [Electric Energy] into Sanity.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Electro allies.

溯源: [Electric Charge] deals AoE Damage within a 3-metre radius.

When an enemy with [Electric Charge] is defeated, their [Electric Charge] is transferred to another random target within a 20-metre radius.
The transferred [Electric Charge] retains its remaining duration, allowing the effect to continue on the new target.
[Volt Rush] Level +2, [Tactical Preservation] Level +1.
At the start of battle, Rhythm gains [Electric Energy] equal to 50% of her Max Sanity.
[Electro Vortex] Level +2, [Tactical Preservation] Level +1.
The number of enemies [Electro Surge] deals damage to per second is increased to 2.

技能.描述:
Press: 
Zhiliu uses [Celestial Revelation: Zhen], dealing Electro Damage to enemies within range in front, which grants Zhiliu 1 [Talisman: Zhen].

Hold:
Zhiliu uses [Celestial Revelation: Xun], dealing Electro Damage to enemies within range in front, which grants Zhiliu Ultra Shield and 1 [Talisman: Xun].

When the user holds fewer than 2 [Talismans], deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies. 
When the user holds 2 or more [Talismans], this skill transforms based on the combination.

术语解释.Thunder's Oracle Peal:
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans: Zhen], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Thunder's Oracle Peal]. 
[Thunder's Oracle Peal]: Consumes all [Talismans], dealing Electro Damage to enemies in a straight line ahead.
术语解释.Myriad Things Thrive:
When holding 1 [Talisman: Zhen] and 1 [Talisman: Xun], replaces [Heaven-Earth Divination] with this skill. 
Removes all [Talismans]. Deals DoT to enemies in a forward area, then creates a [Four Realms Align] field at their location. Every 3s, targets up to 5 enemies within the field to creates a [Zhen-Xun Convergence] at their location, dealing Electro AoE Damage.
术语解释.Fortune's Clarity:
When Zhiliu has 2 [Talismans: Xun], [Heaven-Earth Divination] is replaced with [Fortune's Clarity].
[Fortune's Clarity]: Consumes all [Talismans] to deal Electro Damage to enemies around and increase Zhiliu's Skill Damage.

技能.描述:
Obtains [Talismans] through [Celestial Revelation], up to 2 [Talismans]. When the number of [Talismans] exceeds the limit, the earliest obtained [Talisman] will be removed.
When consuming [Talisman] after using [Thunder's Oracle Peal], [Myriad Things Thrive], or [Fortune's Clarity], each [Talisman] has a chance to be retained based on Zhiliu's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.
Grants 1 stack of Morale when the user or any ally deals Electro Skill DMG (up to 20 stacks).

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Electro allies.

溯源: Casting [Thunder's Oracle Peal] extends the Skill DMG bonus from [Fortune's Clarity] by 3.5s and causes [Four Realms Align] to trigger [Zhen-Xun Convergence] one additional time, each [Zhen-Xun Convergence] bolt dealing 60% of the base damage.

Empowers [Myriad Things Thrive] with alternate trigger effects. Tap: [Zhen-Xun Convergence] targets up to 8 enemies. Hold: [Four Realms Align] persists for the rest of the battle, consuming 6 Sanity per second; ends when Sanity reaches 0 or upon casting a skill or using a weapon.
[Celestial Revelation] Level +2, [Talismans Coalescence] Level +1.
When using [Celestial Revelation], increases ATK for Zhiliu and the nearby teammate(s) by 30% for 16s.
[Heaven-Earth Divination] Level +2, [Talismans Coalescence] Level +1.
When within [Four Realms Align]'s range, increases Zhiliu's PEN stats by 55%.

技能.描述:
Yuming leaps into the air, and the next Plunging Attack is replaced with [Starlight Descent]. Using this skill in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state grants Yuming 1 [Reverse Scale].
When the amount of [Reverse Scale] reaches its maxium, [Starlight Descent] is enhanced to [Starstorm Descent].

术语解释.Starlight Descent: Plunges at high speed, dealing AoE Electro Damage on impact. This attack is regarded as a melee weapon Plunging Attack. Using this skill in [Xuanjiao Manifest] state triggers [Wyrmcall Clouds].
术语解释.Reverse Scale: Reverse Scale persists, with a maximum of 6 scales existing at the same time. The scales are removed when the [Xuanjiao Manifest] state ends.
术语解释.Wyrmcall Clouds: Spawns [Raging Thunders] at targets struck by [Starlight Descent] or [Starstorm Descent], dealing Electro AoE Damage. A maximum of 5 targets can be selected.
术语解释.Starstorm Descent:
Consumes all [Reverse Scales] to grant a Damage Dealt Increase to self and allies.
 Then plunges at high speed, dealing Electro AoE Damage on impact. Counts as a Plunging Attack from a melee weapon. While in [Xuanjiao Manifest], also triggers [Wyrmcall Clouds].

技能.描述:
Deals Electro AoE Damage to enemies in front and enters the [Xuanjiao Manifest] state.
 While active, the user and all Electro allies gain [Fish-Dragon Dance].

术语解释.Xuanjiao Manifest:
Immune to Hitstun. Xuanjiao hovers around [Yuming], dealing Electro Damage to enemies on contact (once every 2s per enemy).
 Xuanjiao absorbs HP damage inflicted on [Yuming]. When the absorbed amount reaches a set percentage of [Yuming]'s Max HP, [Xuanjiao Manifest] ends.
术语解释.Fish-Dragon Dance: When dealing Skill DMG to a target afflicted with [Thunderous Onslaught], deals bonus Electro Damage. Can trigger on the same target once every 3s.

技能.描述:
When dealing damage with a melee weapon, inflicts [Thunderous Onslaught] on enemies, reducing their Electro Resistance.
 During [Xuanjiao Manifest], [Thunderous Onslaught] is automatically applied to all enemies.
Yuming gains 6 [Reverse Scales] when using [Grimscales].

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases Morale for self and Electro allies.

溯源: While in [Xuanjiao Manifest], each [Precipitous Thunderfall] grants 1 extra [Reverse Scale]. Using [Starstorm Descent] also increases Weapon Attack Range by 0.6 and Skill Range by 30% for self and allies, lasting 8s.
[Fish-Dragon Dance] deals 300% of its base damage.
[Precipitous Thunderfall] Level +2; [Soaring Sky-High] Level +1.
Plunging Attack deals additional damage equal to 18% of Yuming's Skill Damage, with a maximum of 36%.
[Grimscales] Level +2; [Soaring Sky-High] Level +1.
[Starlight Descent] and [Starstorm Descent] deal 90% more damage to targets affected by [Thunderous Onslaught]. Using [Starstorm Descent] restores [Xuanjiao]'s DMG absorption by 1.8%.

技能.描述:
Deploys a [Barrier] in front of Randy and deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.
[Barrier] consumes Sanity over time, during which Randy cannot move or use any weapon and is immune to Hitstun when taking damage. [Barrier] inflicts [Overwork Grudge] on nearby enemies.
When this skill is used again, the [Barrier] is retracted.

术语解释.Barrier: [Barrier] blocks frontal projectiles and absorbs their damage, and expires once it has absorbed damage equivalent to 100% of Randy's Max HP.
术语解释.Overwork Grudge: Decreases ATK, and deals Electro Damage once every 2s.

技能.描述:
Throws 1 [Bespoke Shield] forward, triggering [Impact] once when it halts. While active on the battlefield, [Bespoke Shield] triggers [Impact] every 3s.
[Impact] deals damage only to Shields, based on Randy's DEF, and grants an Ultra Shield based on Randy's DEF to Randy and allies. For targets with 0 Shield, [Impact] paralyses them.
When Randy successfully grants an Ultra Shield to a teammate, applies 1 stack that increases their DEF based on Randy's DEF to them, up to 10 stacks.
Once [Barrier] has absorbed damage equivalent to 70% of Randy's Max HP, consumes Sanity to reset the [Barrier] and deals the same barrier deployment damage of [Legitimate Slackness] 1 time.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases DEF for self and allies.

溯源: When [Barrier] absorbs damage from projectiles, inflicts 1 stack of [Overwork Grudge] on the attacker for 3s, up to 2 stacks. [Overwork Grudge] is only stackable in this way.
Each Randy's level increases his Ultra Shield cap by 50 points.
[Legitimate Slackness] Level +2; [Shared Shield] Level +1.
Target hit by [Impact] immediately takes the damage of [Overwork Grudge] inflicted on the target 1 time.
[Special Gift] Level +2; [Shared Shield] Level +1.
When [Impact] hits a target, it also deals additional Electro DMG equal to 1200% of Randy's [Shield points + Ultra Shield points].

技能.描述: Deals Electro Damage to enemies within range in front and creates a field of [Legion's Punishment] at the locations.

术语解释.Legion's Punishment: After a 1.5-second delay, consumes [Might of Thunder] every 0.4s to strike a random enemy within range, dealing Electro Damage. Lasts up to 10s. When [Might of Thunder] is depleted, the [Legion's Punishment] field dissipates. A maximum of 3 fields can exist at once.

技能.描述:
Summons [Chaotic Thunderorb]. A maximum of 1 can exist at the same time. 
Consumes [Might of Thunder] to summon an enhanced [Chaotic Thunderorb]. The interval for the enhanced [Chaotic Thunderorb] to trigger [Devastating Storm] is reduced to 2s, and its Link Damage is increased.

术语解释.Summoned: Chaotic Thunderorb:
Inherits a percentage of Sibylle's Max HP, has 0 DEF, and is treated as an enemy unit.
[Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] calls forth a [Devastating Storm] once every 3s.
Upon summoning, [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] links to the 5 furthest enemies in range, linking 1 additional enemy per second, up to 10 in total. [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] deals Electro Damage to all linked targets once per second.
When [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] takes damage, a percentage is transferred to the linked enemies.
术语解释.Devastating Storm: Deals Electro Damage to nearby enemies.

技能.描述:
When the damage dealt triggers Bonus Effect, Sibylle gains certain points of [Might of Thunder], up to 300 points.
[Divine Conqueror] and [Stormcaller] can be empowered by consuming [Might of Thunder] points.
Damage dealt by [Divine Conqueror] and [Legion's Punishment] has a chance to trigger Bonus Effect based on Sibylle's Melee Weapon Trigger Probability.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Electro allies.

溯源: When taking damage from [Divine Conqueror] and [Legion's Punishment], [Chaotic Thunderorb]'s damage taken transfer ratio is increased by 2%.

Increases [Might of Thunder] point cap to 600.
Each point of [Might of Thunder] increases [Legion's Punishment] damage by 0.1%.
Each point of [Might of Thunder] increases the damage taken transfer ratio of [Chaotic Thunderorb] by 0.01%.
[Divine Conqueror] Level +2; [Might of Thunder] Level +1.
When [Legion's Punishment] deals damage, there is a 20% chance to trigger its effect once.
[Stormcaller] Level +2; [Might of Thunder] Level +1.

When an enemy is linked to the [Summon: Chaotic Thunderorb] for the first time, [Sibylle] deals an additional instance of [Legion's Punishment] damage to that target at 500% of the base multiplier, guaranteed to trigger the Electro bonus effect.

技能.描述:
Commands [Filbert] to charge forwards, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path. Upon hitting any obstacles, triggers Anemo AoE Damage at the endpoint. While this skill is active, heals Truffle and allies, and increases their damage.
When Truffle rides on [Filbert], this skill is replaced with [Trotters Charge-Charge].

术语解释.Trotters Charge-Charge: Hold for a sustained charge, continuously consuming Sanity and dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path. Upon hitting any obstacle, Filbert stops charging, dealing AoE Anemo Damage at the endpoint.

技能.描述:
Truffle rides on [Filbert] and gains 100 points of [Passion For Work] and a Movement Speed boost, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies in the path when moving.
When riding on [Filbert], Truffle is unable to use any weapon but can command [Filbert] to attack. When this skill is used again, Truffle dismounts and unleashes [Trotters Trot-Trot] once.

术语解释.Passion For Work: [Passion For Work] loses 5 point per second, and restores 1 when dealing damage upon knocking into a target. During [Trotters Charge-Charge], [Passion For Work] will not lose. When all [Passion For Work] points drop to 0, Truffle dismounts and unleashes [Trotters Trot-Trot] once.

技能.描述:
Gains 1 stack of [Heavyweight] for every second Truffle keeps moving, up to 10 stacks.
[Heavyweight]: Increases Damage Dealt and decreases Damage Taken.
When dealing skill damage, there is a chance to drop 1 [Ammo Supply Chest].

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases Resolve for self and allies if 2 or more characters on the team share the same element.

溯源: Decreases the losing speed of [Passion For Work] by 50%.
When using a skill, applies an Attack boost equivalent to 3% of Truffle's Max HP to her teammates for 10s, with a maximum boost of 300.
[Trotters Trot-Trot] Level +2; [Chop-Chop, Commissaries!] Level +1.
Increases the stack cap of [Heavyweight] to 20. When Truffle starts mounting [Filbert], gains 20 stacks of [Heavyweight].
[Tummy Full, Hands Full] Level +2; [Chop-Chop, Commissaries!] Level +1.
After picking up [Activated Sal Volatile], [Tranquilizer Dewdrop], or [Ammo Supply Chest], Truffle gains 1 stack that increases her Skill Damage by 45% for 15s, up to 3 stacks.

技能.描述:
Enters [Stealth] state and exits [Relentless Hunt] state. 
Generates 2 [Fang Spikes] to attack nearby enemies when exiting [Stealth] state or using [Stealthy Prowl] again in [Stealth] state.

术语解释.Stealth:
When in [Stealth] state, Outsider cannot be detected by enemies, and taking damage will not exit [Stealth].
Launching attack or using [Predator's Pounce] will exit [Stealth] state.

技能.描述:
Retracts all [Fang Spikes] and enters [Relentless Hunt] state.
For each [Fang Spike] retracted, Outsider loses certain HP, which is converted into an equivalent amount of Ultra Shield, and it additionally extends the duration of [Relentless Hunt] state.
When losing HP due to this effect, the minimum HP will not drop below 1.

术语解释.Relentless Hunt:
When in [Relentless Hunt] state, Outsider is immune to Hitstun and gains weapon Attack Speed boost and Resolve boost.
Outsider cannot receive Healing in this state, and any Healing received is converted into an equivalent amount of Ultra Shield.

技能.描述: When taking damage, Outsider generates 1 [Fang Spike] to attack the damage dealer. This effect can only be triggered once per second.

术语解释.Fang Spike:
When generated, [Fang Spike] flies toward its target, dealing Anemo Damage to enemies along the path and infilcting [Throatcutter] on them.
After flying for a period of time, [Fang Spike] falls and remains on the ground. A maximum of 10 [Fang Spikes] can exist at the same time.
[Throatcutter]: increases damage taken from Outsider.

技能.描述: When not in [Relentless Hunt] state, there is a chance to generate 1 [Fang Spike] to attack the target while dealing damage with a melee weapon. This effect can only be triggered once per second.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Anemo allies.

溯源: Exiting [Stealth] state increases the weapon CRIT Chance by 60% for 24s.
When [Fang for Fang] or [Ravenous Gnaw] generates [Fang Spike], there is a 50% chance to generate 1 additional [Fang Spike].
[Stealthy Prowl] Level +2, [Fang Spike] Level +1.
When in [Stealth] state, increases Movement Speed by 35%.
[Predator's Pounce] Level +2, [Fang Spike] Level +1.
When in [Relentless Hunt] state, Outsider deals additional Anemo Damage by 20%.

技能.描述: Creates 1 [Phantasm] and then flashes forward. This skill can be used at any time without interrupting Psyche's current action. In [Flamboyance] state, this skill is replaced with [Phototaxis].

术语解释.Phantasm:
Once created, the Phantasm continuously slows down nearby enemies. After 5 seconds, it deals Anemo Damage to nearby enemies and vanishes. 
When a new [Phantasm] is created, the existing [Phantasm] immediately deals Anemo Damage and vanishes.
术语解释.Phototaxis: Charges forward in the air and releases 16 [Ethereal Powders]. The [Ethereal Powders] automatically lock onto 1 enemy, dealing Anemo Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Powder Stigma], up to 12 stacks.
术语解释.Powder Stigma: When a target afflicted with [Powder Stigma] takes Ranged Weapon DMG from [Psyche], 1 stack of [Powder Stigma] is consumed to deal Anemo Damage.

技能.描述:
Enters [Flamboyance] state and gains the ability to fly.
When in [Flamboyance] state, Psyche can only use skills and shoot. [Flamboyance] state continuously consumes Sanity, and when Sanity drops to 0 or this skill is used again, [Flamboyance] state ends.

When Psyche's HP percentage is above 15%, [Flamboyance] state consumes HP insteand of Sanity. The consumed HP will be converted into Ultra Shield at a certain percentage.

When dealing CRIT damage, Psyche gains one of the following buffs at random: ATK Boost, Skill Damage Boost, or Resolve Boost.
Increases Psyche's damage for each buff she gains, up to 12 buffs.

When using [Fluorescent Eclosion], if Psyche's HP percentage is no less than 75%, gains [Ephemeral as Dew].
[Ephemeral as Dew]: When triggering the effect of Morale/Resolve, it regards Psyche's HP percentage as 1%. This effect can only be triggered once every 120s.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
Increases ATK for self and Anemo allies.

溯源: Using [Chrysalis Dreamweave] or [Phototaxis] restores 10% of Psyche's Max HP and increases Psyche's damage by 35% for 12s.
While in [Flamboyance], fires 16 [Ethereal Powder] particles every 5s. When [Ethereal Powder] or [Powder Stigma] deals damage, there is a 35% chance to spawn a [Phantasm] at the target's location.
[Chrysalis Dreamweave] Level +2; [Amberlight] Level +1.

When in [Flamboyance] state, Psyche gains [Eclosion].
[Eclosion]: Grants immunity to Hitstun, decreases Damage Taken by 25%, and increases Auto Pick-up Range by 15.
[Fluorescent Eclosion] Level +2; [Amberlight] Level +1.
During [Flamboyance] state, increases Psyche's PEN stats by 50%.

技能.描述:
Grants [Emerald Effusion]. While active, alchemical smoke fills the area around the user, continuously healing self and allies while slowing enemies in the area. 
While [Emerald Effusion] is active, generates 2 [Azoth Projectiles] per second.

Heals self and allies, applying [Purification Formula]. Briefly restrains nearby enemies and inflicts [Decay Formula] on them. 
Generates 1 [Azoth Projectile] per affected target (ally or enemy), up to a maximum of 12.

术语解释.Decay Formula: Decreases Attack and deals periodic Anemo Damage to affected targets once every 2s.

技能.描述:
Increases Daphne's Ranged Weapon Trigger Probability when she possesses [Azoth Projectile].
Daphne can hold up to 30 [Azoth Projectiles], and each ranged weapon attack consumes 1 [Azoth Projectile].

When Daphne possesses [Azoth Projectile] and her ranged weapon attack deals damage, target hit by the ranged weapon attack incurs the DoT of [Decay Formula] 1 time. The damage is based on a certain percentage of Daphne's Ranged Weapon Trigger Probability.

[Available only when deployed as a Combat Partner]
 Increases CRIT Chance for self and allies.

溯源: While [Emerald Effusion] is active, self and allies gain +10% Damage Dealt.
During [Emerald Effusion] state, the [Azoth Projectile] Daphne gains per second increases to 3.
[Emerald Effusion] Level +2; [Azoth Projectile] Level +1.
Restores 1 points of Sanity for each [Azoth Projectile] consumed.
[Repulsion Synthesis] Level +2; [Azoth Projectile] Level +1.

When a teammate applied with [Purification Formula] deals damage to an enemy inflicted with [Decay Formula], Daphne gains 1 stack that increases Damage Dealt by 7% for 12s, up to 3 stacks. This effect can only be triggered once per second.
